text: Every step you take, I foresaw. Every mistake, I rehearsed.
Every war is a plan with many layers.
A sliver of the Soul-Eater pulses still — and whispers.
Knowledge bleeds, but von Kammler does not flinch.
He sees what others call madness and names it prophecy.
Each spell twists, reflects, and doubles back.
He offers truths, for a price you’ll only understand too late
You never fight him — only where he was.
kammler's devotion to Olric is as fiery as his Norse heritage driven lust for plunder and battle.
Von Kammler was once bound by crystal and madness, now unshackled and worse for it.

Ernst von Kammler, once a mortal sorcerer of the Empire, vanished beyond the Frozen Sea in pursuit of secrets buried in the Chaos Wastes. There, he found the Soul-Eater — a crystalline prison of impossible knowledge and shifting lies. Bound to it for years, he became its guardian and victim, twisted by Tzeentch’s will. His liberation came at the hands of Einarr Steelfist, though whether this was salvation or manipulation is still unclear. Now he serves not through loyalty, but through the certainty that this path leads to destiny — or damnation.
I was shattered once. That only made me sharper.
A jagged crystal that radiates impossible knowledge — and madness.
Local Recruitment duration: %+n turn for all Marauder Champion and Huscarl units
